dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Hello, I'd like to buy a sword.

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: Sure thing! Which one would you like? We have longswords, shortswords, and broadswords.

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: Excellent choice! That will be 50 gold pieces.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Here you go, keep the change.
